product_name: New Balance 580v3 Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The performance-driven New Balance 580v3 Road-Running Shoes deliver a fast, comfortable ride and a great fit for your training runs and races. Nylon mesh uppers with synthetic leather overlays are lightweight and breathable. Injection-molded EVA foam midsoles are firm yet flexible to provide good support and cushion. PL-1 last shape provides a standard fit with slight adjustments, including a closer fit in the toe box and good arch support. ABZORB(R) cushioning soaks up shock and adds soft comfort from heel to toe. Blown rubber outsoles provide good traction on roads. Closeout.
